prompt:
Transform the subject of the uploaded photo into an ultra-realistic vertical (9:16) fashion portrait while preserving their facial identity, hair color, hairstyle, and body shape.

The subject is seated on indoor stairs beside a matte concrete wall. A rectangular beam of golden sunlight from a window hits the wall, casting a crisp shadow silhouette inside the bright frame. They wear a black ribbed knit sweater, tapered grey chinos, and chunky white sneakers. Pose: elbows on thighs, hands loosely clasped, chin slightly lifted, eyes looking toward the light, calm and confident expression.

Lighting: hard warm sunlight from camera-right as the key, soft ambient bounce fill, high contrast with long shadows, cinematic golden-hour mood.

Camera & composition: low-mid angle from a few steps below, 50–85mm f/2.2 lens, shallow depth of field, clean optics, realistic skin texture, fine film grain, subtle vignette.

Style: minimalist background, no clutter, fashion editorial realism. Keep all proportions, facial features, hair, and body shape accurate.

Exclude: cartoon, CGI, AI artifacts, over-smoothing, plastic skin, excessive sharpening, motion blur, warped anatomy, extra fingers, disfigured hands, double shadow, blown highlights, banding, watermark, logo, text, bad perspective, dirty wall, clutter.

Transform the subject of the uploaded photo into a classic black-and-white half-length artistic portrait while preserving facial identity, hair color, hairstyle, and body shape.

Use studio-style lighting with a single diffused light to emphasize facial contours and eyes. Apply soft film grain and a subtle gradient background.

Compose the portrait slightly off-center with generous negative space. Maintain a quiet, elegant mood inspired by classic photographer portraiture. Do not include text or logos.

Transform the subject of the uploaded photo into a cinematic casual street-style portrait while preserving the subject’s facial identity, hair color, hairstyle, and body shape.

The subject is walking naturally down a city street at night, wearing a plain T-shirt, jeans, and sneakers. The framing is a waist-up mid-shot.

The background features neon signs, city lights, and reflections on wet pavement. Lighting is moody and urban, with a shallow depth of field and slight film grain.

The overall look is realistic, cinematic, and Instagram-ready without altering the subject’s likeness.

Transform the subject of the uploaded photo into a soft pastel aesthetic portrait while preserving the subject’s facial identity, hair color, hairstyle, and body shape.

The background features softly blurred flowers in pastel tones. The subject remains naturally posed and recognizable.

Lighting is warm golden-hour sunlight with a gentle glow. The style is dreamy and romantic with light film grain.

Maintain realistic facial features and proportions while enhancing softness and mood.

Transform the subject of the uploaded photo into a cozy indoor lifestyle portrait while preserving the subject’s facial identity, hair color, hairstyle, and body shape.

The subject is seated near a window holding a warm mug of coffee, wrapped in a soft blanket. A bookshelf appears subtly in the background.

Lighting is natural window light with a warm, slightly desaturated tone. Depth of field is shallow for a relaxed, intimate feel.

The overall mood is calm, comfortable, and authentic.
